entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1900 metres lowering to 1600 metres overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1600 metres rising to 2200 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. A few rain showers beginning in the evening then changing to a few flurries overnight. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
